resources.string:
Welcome to TheoTown


This app is currently in development. Be aware of that there might be still some small bugs. Please do not vote down this project for those little issues. Keep in mind that it's free.


If you like this app you might support us by telling your friends about it.


Have fun :)

Jika Anda benar-benar ingin menyembunyikan iklan, sebaiknya Anda mendukung kami dengan memberi tahu teman Anda tentang aplikasi ini.
\n\nAre you sure?
Tidak dapat memuat kota, kayaknya filenya rusak.\n\nMaaf.
Apa kamu yakin ingin menghapus ini?
Apa kamu yakin ingin keluar dari TheoTown?
Please use another name for your city. It\'s not allowed to be empty.
Ukuran ini hanya eksperimental dan mungkin tidak bekerja pada perangkat Anda. Apakah Anda benar-benar membutuhkan peta yang besar?
Kota besar membutuhkan balai kota. Para penduduk akan menyukainya
Gunakan kabel ini untuk menghubungkan kota Anda dengan pembangkit listrik Anda.
Turbin angin membuat kebisingan namun tidak menimbulkan polusi.
PLTB menghasilkan banyak tenaga, tapi juga buruk bagi lingkungan.
Panel surya bagus untuk lingkungan dan mereka tidak mencemari lingkungan.
Disini para penduduk bisa melihat para dokter.
Penduduk merasa nyaman tinggal dekat rumah sakit.
Tempat dimana anak remaja belajar sesuatu.
Tempat dimana orang dewasa belajar tentang sejarah.
Pipa bisa digunakan untuk membawa air ke dalam bangunan.
TheoTown App for Android is a product of
Mencegah dan memadamkan. Punya dua truk damkar.
Sebuah gedung Gillender. Terima kasih atas 250,000 unduhan :D
Sebuah tempat dimana para anak anak muda belajar.
Sebuah taman kecil dengan pohon. Para penduduk akan menyukaina.
Tidak ada hewan yang dirugikan dalam produksi!
Anda dapat menekan kanan bawah pojok
There\'s a donate button on the homepage
Congratulations, your city exceeds a size of %1$,d inhabitants!
A little park with trees. Your habitants will like it.
Might not create save directory for %1$s. Please check app permissions.
Penduduk akan membangun rumah didalam zona ini.
Bangunan komersial bisa dibangun di dalam zona ini.
Bangunan industri akan dibangun di sini.
Mobil bisa melaju kencang di atasnya.
Di sini para penduduk akan menaiki bis untuk ke pemberhentian berikutnya.
Terminal bis diperlukan untuk mengeluarkan bis.
Anda bisa menghapus apapun dengan alat ini. Kecuali zona dan pipa.
Alat ini bisa digunakan untuk menghapus pipa air.
Sebuah lapangan sepak bola akan membuat penduduk Anda bahagia.
Ayo kita berenang ke bak air raksasa!.
Anak-anak akan main tenis di sini.
Sebuah paviliun tempat pesta bisa berlangsung.
Jam akan memberitahu orang-orang jam berapa sekarang.
Kita hampir kehabisan listrik. Bangun lebih banyak pembangkit listrik lagi!.
Kita hampir kehabisan air bersih. Bangun lebih banyak PAM!.
Semua orang punya agama, jadi tolong bangun rumah ibadah
Kami mau lebih banyak taman disini.
Kami butuh olahraga!. Bangun lapangan olahraga sekarang.
Ada bangunan yang tidak punya listrik!
Ada bangunan yang tidak punya air!
Dengan atap, para pemain bisa bermain di segala cuaca!.
Congrats, you unlocked the upgrade %1$s for building %2$s!
Kebakaran! Kirimkan truk pemadam kebakaran untuk memadamkan api. Pertimbangkan untuk membangun lebih banyak departemen pemadam kebakaran.
Penduduk kamu akan senang ketika mendengar radio.
Panggil polisi untuk menghentikan tindakan kriminal.
Panggil damkar ketika ada sesuatu yang terbakar.
Ketika ada kecelakaan, kamu harus panggil ambulans.
Sends the newest news about the city. Improves knowledge. \n \nOnly one radio program allowed at the same time. Old programs will be removed.

Sends sports reports and exciting live broadcasts of sporting events. Acts like a sports court with very long range. \n \nOnly one radio program allowed at the same time. Old programs will be removed.

Sends mostly music and a light entertainment program. The listeners feel better. So acts like a park with very long range. \n \nOnly one radio program allowed at the same time. Old programs will be removed.

Sends conversations on the subject of faith and our existence on earth. Basically works as a house of worship with a long range in the city. \n \nOnly one radio program allowed at the same time. Old programs will be removed.
Tidak ada kapal yang jauh dan luas, tapi ada mercusuar .... aneh.
You can always show and hide the minimap.
We start with building some road. Select the simpliest road type.
Place the road along the marked tiles. To build it tap to set a start point, tap again to set the end point.
Great work! Now close the road tool.
Let\'s try to build some solar panels.
Place it on the marked tiles.
You can use wires to transport energy.
Place it along the marked tiles.
Let\'s try to build a water tower to provide some water.
Place it on the marked tile.
A water tower alone isn\'t enough. You need pipes in order to transport it.
Place the pipes along the marked tiles.
Great work. Now you can start with declaring zones.
Zones describe who can build where. There are three types of them.
Let\'s declare a residential zone. Habitants can build their houses there.
Place the zone on the marked tiles.
Let\'s continue with a commercial zone. Commercials will build there.
Place the zone on the marked tiles.
Last but not least, industrial zones. That\'s where factories will be built.
Place the zone on the marked tiles.
Great work. Now buildings will be built.
You should keep industrial zones away from other ones because of pollution and noise.
Tap on this button to see detailed demand information for every zone type.
You can change simulation speed in order to shorten waiting time.
Just set it back to normal speed.
Your task is it to gain money from taxes to enlarge your city.
Tap at the bottom right corner to get more information about your money or to change taxes.
Congratulations, you learned the basics of TheoTown. Now you can start your own city :)
Cars may only drive in one direction on this road type. Use it to control traffic.
Kebakaran diPenduduk kota kamu!. Bangun stasiun damkar untuk memadamkan api.
Sebuah puing bangunan yang hancur. Kamu bisa menghapus lagi.
Tolong beri saya sepeser pun, saya sangat membutuhkannya :(
Default pinjaman, 10,000Ͳ \nRentang waktu: 24 months \nBiaya per bulan: 500Ͳ
A big meteorite crater. You should remove it.
A small meteorite crater. You should remove it.
Anda dapat mendukung kami dengan mengetuk iklan :)
Angin topan adalah bencana yang sangat berbahaya di kota anda.
Sebuah zona penduduk yang sangat padat akan banyaknya penduduk.
Sebuah zona komersil yang sangat padat.
Sebuah zona untuk beternak dan bertani. Ukuran minimum 4X4.
Can only be built one time
High education is provided by high schools.
Influence of fire departmens reduces the probabilty of fires.
Doctors help to keep your inhabitants healthy.
Nobody wants to live in a noisy area.
Makes your inhabitants happy and allow a higher building density.
Nobody wants to live in a polluted area.
Religion increases the attribute of your inhabitants.
Industry area for the waterfront of your city.
Shows buildings that may not be removed.
A nice residential for the mayor.
A Town Hall would suit your town.
A village square for your townhall.
Has to be built near water.
Decreases water pollution by releasing wasted water to the nature. Has a bad influence.
Cities will be saved in internal storage. You will have no access to them.
Helps ships to find the way.
Lebih banyak listrik daripada PLTB. Butuh sangat banyak air. Bisa meledak ketika tidak ada air.
Lebih murah daripada pembangkit listrik lain. Sedikit polusi.
Some entertaintment for the habitants of TheoTown.
There\'s no money left. You may take some loans.
A small elementary school for small villes.
Use this tool in order to remove zone definition.
Prevents and extinguishes fires. Has small radius and only one car.
Starts a riot which can only be stopped by police SWAT teams.
Have a wonderful day at the beach.
People want to life in our town. Declare a residential zone for them.
Build a commercial zone so commercials may build in our city.
Industries may build in our city, but you have to declare zones for them first.
This police station will lead to silence and order in your city.
Some buildings don\'t have a road connection. You should fix this.
We have some really polluted water here!
TheoTown has developed a lot since this city has been created. It might therefore not work as expected. Please don\'t hate us (◕‿◕✿)
Low health. You should improve environment values or build a medic station.
Enter the new name for your city here.
Enter the new name for this building.
Sorry, your device has not sufficient amount of RAM to run TheoTown.
Do you want to save your progress before closing?
Enter a name for the copy.
We have some crime here. You should build more police stations or improve happiness.
Maybe we should improve traffic by building a main road. Select the country road.
Tap on the start and the end point of the planned road. See how a bridge will be built automaticially over the river.
Have a wonderful day at the beach.
If there\'s a riot only SWAT teams can hande it.
There\'s a riot for no reason!
There\'s a demonstration in our town because of %1s! Do something or something bad will happen!
The perfect road to connect distant areas.
People here are unhappy because of %1$s. You should try to improve the happiness.
And the rest of our community
Convert city into sandbox mode?\n\nThis cannot be undone!
Congratulations, your city %1$s reached a new rank:
Helicopters may land and start here.\n\nIncreses the range of the fire department.
All settings will be lost. Are you sure?
Removes the ads at the bottom of the screen.
An unidentified flying object attacks your city!
We have a new currency: Theons Ͳ
Work in progress. Do not cross the line.
I will build my own city with skyscrapers and parks
May the Force be with you
A bigger high school for more students.
Use this game mode to play around without money. Has no ranks and less achievements.
In this game mode you start with a lot of money and it\'s a little bit easier overall.
Default game mode. You start with a good amount of money and it shouldn\'t be to difficult to build the city of your dreams.
You are a pro in TheoTown? Then this is the right mode for you. You start with a small amount of money and it\'s difficult overall.
We have to improve %1$s happiness so %2$s can move into our city.
You can unlock this rank immediately, if you want to.
Some small residential, commercial and industrial buildings for more variety in the city. Includes graphics for winter time.
It looks as if these diamonds are yours now.
Do you want to connect this road to other cities?
Do you want to unlock this area to create a new city here?
At least %1$,d inhabitants in the region needed.
Highway built and paid by the state.
Country road built and paid by the state.
Do you want to reset this city to it\'s original state? This cannot be undone.
One-way road built and paid by the state.
Your city is just part of something bigger. Here you can see all of your cities.

In TheoTown we discriminate building demand for different building types and different levels. Building types are residential, commercial and industrial. There are three levels, poor (Ͳ), medium (ͲͲ) and rich (ͲͲͲ).
Welcome to your first town.\n\nTry to get 300 inhabitants.
Congratulations your city reached a new rank.\n\nEach rank unlocks some buildings and you get a reward.

Dear player,

we recently made a lot of progress in TheoTown. Unfortunately, this wouldn't be possible if we didn't add a special currency as well as changes to game dynamics which may break some old cities.

We hope you understand. We have something as thank-you gift for you.
Cannot unlock more than %1$,d maps at once.
It\'s a lot of work to unlock a map. May you want us to support us? This can reduce unlocking time by 30 minutes.
We are currently unlocking this map for you.
Enter here a new name for the region:
A big city hall for a big city. It\'s a thank you for 1 M downloads.
This water pump stands in polluted area. We better place it somewhere else in order to keep water clean.
We better dispose of this rubbish before someone notices it.
I think it\'s time to give our children some education. Build an elementary school.
Let\'s get some genius by building a high school.
Allows you to use faster game speed for %1$s.
There\'s too much traffic on this road. I recommend to build more or better roads.
This school is full. Build more of them, please.
We have not enough money to buy this.\n\nDo you want to get the missing %1$s immediately?
There\'s not enough space in this hospital. We have to build another one.
Then rate us please. It takes just a moment.
Any suggestions how we can improve the game? Please tell us.
Would you like to skip %1$,d days?
Build your own military base to protect your city. Includes an ufo disaster.
Science! We found a solution to improve game resolution. Would you like to use it?\n\nThis can be changed in the settings any time.
Military buildings may only be placed within this zone.
A road dedicated to military vehicles and emergency cars. You might not build other roads in military area.
The headquarters is the most important building of your military base.
Can be used to shoot UFOs. May not be used to shoot civil buildings or vehicles.
The government would like to do some rocket testing in your town. As this may lead to disasters you get a compensation for the risk.
This small mountain is a tourist attraction in this mostly flat land.
This small mountain is a tourist attraction in this mostly flat land.
Do you want to establish a connection to the outside?
Oops...I\'m afraid our last rocket test issued a galactic disaster.
Mayor, we need you to spend all the money!
Big residential, commercial and industrial buildings for more variety in the city. Boosts living standard of your inhabitants.
Enter a name for this area.
Enter a new text for your label or delete it at all.
Create, edit and remove labels with this tool.
Some decorations for your commercial area.
A slower speed mode which gives you more control for certain situations.
Just some sand. Also used for beaches.
A fire station with huge radius, a lot of cars and a helipad upgrade for a helicopter.
What about some motor sports in your town? Will also spawn go-carts on normal road.
Has huge radius and many cars. Useful to prevent or extinguish fires.
What about some motor sports in your town? Will also spawn go-carts on normal road.
What a lovely place, isn\'t it?
However, let\'s build a big city, but maybe we should start slowly.
Tap on the screen to move the map. You can zoom with two fingers.
Great, I think you have some feeling for the controls now. So we can start with your first city.
How convenient, the nation has already built some roads here, so we can use them for free.
Let\'s declare a residential area here. People will build houses on their own then.
Better we surround the area with some roads. People will only build near roads.
Now we have to wait for people to move into our town.
Hey, what\'s that? Looks as if someone has no energy!
Of course not. We have no energy source, yet. Let\'s build some solar panels near the highway.
Now we need some wires to connect the residential area with the panels.
Construction of the panels takes some time. You can either wait or tap on it to accelerate building process for free.
Ok, we have energy now. But wait, what\'s that? People also want to have water?
It\'s not that difficult. Let\'s build a water tower to provide some water.
Here we also have to wait for the building to complete. Instead of waiting we might buy it for diamonds.
For water we use pipes to transport it to your buildings. Build some for future purposes.
Great, we have now some inhabitants with power and water. But wait, something is still missing...
Mayor, we have no jobs nor a place to buy things!
Alright, we also need commercial and industrial zones. Let\'s have a look into the demand overview.
Here you can see demand for res (residential), com (commercial) and ind (industrial) buildings.
For each type (res, com or ind)) there are three levels of wealth: Ͳ, ͲͲ and ͲͲͲ which correspond to poor, medium and rich.
Of course we want to have rich inhabitants only, but we have to start slowly. As you can see we need some Ͳ commercials for now.
Declaring some more commercial zones? I think you can do that.
Well done! According to the demand graph there\'s demand for industrial zone, now. Let\'s declare it short of our residential area.
On average you need as much commercial and industrial zones as you have residential ones.
You may have noticed that it\'s easy to lose clear view in your city. Therefore I would like to present you: The Minimap
Great. Let\'s have a look into other magic stuff.
Here you can see general information about your city. You can rename it by tapping on it\'s current name.
Another useful tool is this one.
It shows you details about the happiness of your inhabitants.
Wouldn\'t it be cool to be the master of time? Try to make anything faster.
And now go back to normal speed...
I\'m sorry to interrupt you, but there\'s also non magical stuff. Money for example.
Here I give you a short overview about our money. We can earn money by taxes, so it\'s in our interest to get more inhabitants.
In some cases we might have to take a loan... let\'s hope that this won\'t happen.
I think we have enough money...for now. Let\'s focus more on building. Lets build some parks. People like parks.
Oops, that\'s one park more than I wanted. Let\'s remove one.
Good work, so far. Now I want to present you the rank indicator. It shows you the current rank of your city.
Gain inhabitants and solve disasters to reach the next rank. This way you can unlock more buildings.
About disasters, they will happen... You can access action forces via this tab, when available.
To make things visible you can use this tab.
I told you most of the things I know. But one important thing left: There are presents
You\'ll get a present for free every day.
If you\'re searching for a great community, you will find it on www.theotown.com
Gives you limited ability for super fast game speed.
You can use super fast game speed for a longer time.
You\'re the ultimate master of all times. Gives you great stamina for super fast speed usage.
Uses some top secret technology to control weather.
Uses some top secret technology! You can use it to control weather.
A military fence for decoration purposes.
Build your own city in this city simulation game.

Do you want to build your own city? In TheoTown you can watch your own city growing. Declare zones for residential, commercial or industrial buildings and build road to connect them. Make your city more attractive by building parks, schools and many more facilities.
If you provide TheoTown access to external storage, it will save cities in the directory TheoTown/maps on your device so you have access to them.
A huge fog machine that can generate fog for the whole city.
Sometimes trees have to be replanted if the environment is too polluted. The Forester\'s Lodge replants trees automatically.
Sometimes trees have to be replanted if the environment is too polluted. This house replants trees automatically.
Inhabitants feel safe near bunkers. At least they\'re fireproof.
Build your airport within this airfield zone.
Just some letters to give %1$s a personal touch.
Some placeable letters that can be used for decorative purposes.
You may have to restart the app to properly change the language.
A wonderful fountain that will delight the inhabitants of %1$s and you, too.
A wonderful fountain that will delight the inhabitants of your town and also you.
Big wires for a lot of energy. For regional energy exchange.
A transformer is needed to transform between high and normal voltage. Build it near a transmission line.
Come to the light side, we have icecream
Every pixel is made by hand
May contain traces of hard work
Allow gameplay upload without Wifi connection (may be expensive!)
Enter a new name for your airplane:
A long range airplane from TheoAir.
A golden variant of the long range airplane from TheoAir.
Make your airport more realistic with these decorations.
You have to build a tower in oder to control your airport
You have to ensure that your tower is working
Add a new lane for your airport
Only one lane at a time can be added
Enter a new name for your lane:
Enter your redeem code here to redeem it:
The entered redeem code could not be redeemed. Please check for typing errors.
An airport needs at least one tower to work properly.
An airport needs an entry so people can come into it.
Gates are needed for incoming/outgoing passengers.
A runway where planes can start and land. Minimum length is 12.
A double-deck, long range airplane from TheoAir. It has a lot of space.
Would you like to shorten this waiting time a bit?\n%1$s left.
Please help us and rate TheoTown
With the Starter Package you\'ll receive:
Login so that we can synchronize your profile.
Use this road to connect your gates with your runways.
Ever-expanding slime that will slowly consume not everything in sight.
Ever-expanding slime that will slowly consume everything in sight.
A hydroelectric Power Plant that can be used to create electricity using the power of rivers. Does not generate pollution.
Slime disasters will eat up your city. Of course, only if you want it to do so.
The Christmas tree will fill the hearts of your inhabitants with joy and glory. Do you see any presents?
The Jardine House is a office tower placed in Hong Kong. It has 52 floors and has a height of 179 m. It was completed in 1972.
The Bank of China Tower in Hong Kong houses the headquarters for the Bank of China HK. It has 70 floors, is 367 m high and was finished in 1990.
Children like to build snowmen in winter time.
The International Commerce Centre in Hong Kong is a 108 storey, commercial skyscraper. It\'s the tallest building in Hong Kong with a height of 484 m. It was completed in 2010.
A firework with the shape of a torch.
This firework mimics the shape of a jellyfish.
A switch to initiate fireworks. Connect it to wires.
Place and compose your own fireworks.
A switch that will automatically emit a signal on new year.
A fast long range airplane from TheoAir.
A red and yellow explosion combined with white fade.
A red explosion with a yellow fade out.
A red explosion with a cool light effect.
A beautiful explosion with mixed colors and a fade out.
Three white explosions combined with a red fade out.
Big rockets shot into the air.
Your first very own helicopter. Unfortunately, it won\'t listen to you.
Looks as if something is stucking in the ground. Better you remove it.
A radioactive destroyed structure. You should remove it.
TheoTown needs access to external storage to save your progress.
Rock is falling from the sky!
We have a nuclear explosion right here!
By enabling gameplay upload you allow us to upload your gameplay to our servers. See the disclaimer for more information.
Would you like to unlock this bus immediately?
Do you want to place this building here? We will finish the building immediately for you.
The Brandenburg Gate is a German landmark that was built in the 18th century. It\'s located in Berlin.
You dismissed multiple tasks, so would you like to disable them for this city?
The Arc de Triomphe in Paris honours those who fought and died in the French Revolutionary.
Drastic reduce of building time for all buildings.
Watch a short video to boost building time for %s.
The Eiffel Tower in Paris is the most prominent landmark of France. The tower is 324 metres tall and was finished in 1889.
Would you like to collect what %1$s earned while you were absent?\n\n%2$s
